actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23 of the District of Columbia Code with respect to the release or other dispositions prior to trial of persons charged with criminal offenses.

summary.text: Amends the District of Columbia Code to revise the conditions for detention of accused criminal offenders prior to trial. Allows detention of such individuals if their release would pose a threat to the security of the property of others. Revises the Code to prohibit release prior to trial of persons accused of first or second degree murders, with certain exceptions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23 of the District of Columbia Code with respect to the release or other dispositions prior to trial of persons charged with criminal offenses.
